name: The Young Offenders
summary:
BBC最新青春喜剧，改编自同名电影，讲述两个好基友调皮捣蛋的故事，青春中二基情满满。
The series follows the adventurous lives of Cork 15-year-olds Conor MacSweeney (Alex Murphy) and Jock O'Keeffe (Chris Walley). Their criminal activities often brings themselves into trouble with the police, and their positions at their school is repeatedly put in jeopardy. Their continuous feud with their principal, Barry Walsh (P.J. Gallagher), is well-depicted throughout the series' narrative, and their feelings for Principal Walsh's daughters Siobhan and Linda is also shown through the show.

eps.name: Christmas Special
eps.desc: The residents of the estate of where Conor, Jock and Mairead live on are campaigning against the council's intentions of eviction, for the estate to be renovated, afraid that they might never get back into their homes if forced out. Meanwhile, Mairead, who has been ill for a number of weeks now, is in hospital. Conor and Jock both show their concern, and ask her if there is anything that they could do to make her better. Having never seen a white Christmas, Conor and Jock set off on an adventure to give Mairead the greatest Christmas she has ever seen.
